thread.title: Excellent modern hotel in Republique -
thread.title_full: Excellent modern hotel in Republique - Review of Renaissance Paris Republique Hotel, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: FrenchieMimiz
title: Excellent modern hotel in Republique -
text:
The Renaissance Republique is truly a great hotel with many assets:
- Perfect location in the center of Paris, with the metro very close by (lines 3, 5, 8, 9, 11)
- Modern and recent hotel with beautiful design, charming deco, pleasant t bar, lovely and good restaurant, great patio
- Rooms are very nice (we stayed a Bobo room) not only design is lovely but the room is “big” for Paris! We even had a balcony. A luxe!
For me it is a perfect hotel to stay while visiting Paris.
Good restaurants in the neighbourhoods: La Bonne Cecile, Pramil, Inaro (wine bar), Lavomatic (speakeasy bar)
